text:
Spindle Devhouse | UI Developer | Groningen, NL | Full-time, onsite | https://jobs.wearespindle.com/ui-designer/

At Spindle we are bringing open and free communication to the world. We are looking for a UI designer that is dedicated to making user-friendly and beautiful interfaces.

To read more about our hiring process and see our other vacancies, visit: jobs.wearespindle.com.
